welcome.message:
Welcome to use ActiveX for Chrome.
Before get started, please finish the following configures for your security.

plug_desp.message: Allow your chrome using ActiveX plugins.

url_desp.message: Specify the sites that allow to use ActiveX controls. Input one pattern per line.

url_format.message: The format should be like scheme://host/path . Use * to present any strings, ex, "http://*.google.com/*", "*://*.bar.com/foo/*" (without quates). Please note the slash after host CANNOT be omitted.

url_regex.message: To use Regular Expression, add "/r" before this line

clsid_desp.message: The trusted CLSIDs, one per line. All controls whose CLSIDs are in the following list will be actived.

copyright.message: This extension is made by eagleonhill.

submit_issue.message: To submit an issue, or for technical support, click here!!
